resources.string: are you sure you want to reset all your progress?
Wrong Answer! you can always try again!
Division by 0 or not Neutral Division
Dividing by 0 is a math error

string-array.name: tutorial_string_array
string-array.item: Its easy to learn math with us,you have a simple goal,reach the big number in black using all four numbers given,press next to continue
now we will choose a number,lets say 6
lets choose an operator,lets try plus
Now lest choose another number to add to 6,lets go with 1
Now together we have 7,lets try to subtract 4 from the 7,we will choose minus first this time
and now we can pick the number we want to subtract from first we will pick 7
we want to subtract 4 from it so we will pick 4
And now we can pick the plus operator
Grate! we reached our goal,press next to continue
After reaching our goal in stage mode you can press the home button ,restart the level or press the next button for next stage,Press next please
This is the arcade mode,here you have 01:30 minutes to solve as much as you can,you got 3 Lifebuoys that will change you question and will cost you 10 seconds

string-array.name: tutorial_string_array_new
string-array.item: You need to reach this number in order to complete the level
you need to use all 4 given numbers to do so
you can use all of the operators any number of times
Click here to start over the level
You can get a hint by clicking the buoy.\n ***on the arcade mode each buoy will change question and cost you 10 seconds***

resources.string: You can claim free coins every 6h
